<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hippocampus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=696)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Hippocampi serve as steeds for aquatic humanoids or roam wild in the sea.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Hippocampus.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Hippocampus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=696)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +4, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 24

**[Buck](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=6)** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 17

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 5 feet, swim 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +7 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 bludgeoning

**Sudden Retreat** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The hippocampus makes a tail Strike, then [Swims](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) with a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its swim Speed. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement.

</column>
